ComicInfo.Title: The Demon Brigade!!
ComicInfo.Summary: The Demon Brigade!!: Thor and his companions try to release the captive Odin from their lizard captors, but Odin urges them to surrender and they are overwhelmed and imprisoned. Thor ponders Odinâ€™s weakness and concludes that the slaves are being fed drugged food. Thor escapes and turns the tables, freeing the slaves and leaving Sssthgar no choice but to reveal to Thor the whereabouts of Sif. The Asgardians set sail to find her.
